trends: There have been no other sightings in Lacombe
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving to my home at the time in covington from my now fiancee's house at that time in slidell. i was listening to a robert johnson record and smoking cigarettes to pass the time while driving. my sunroof in my car was open and i remember looking up through it and blowing smoke through the sunroof. as i was looking out of the sunroof i passed underneath an overpass and just as i could see the sky, a bright light appeared instantly and i felt a strange rush of energy in my body. i don't remember what color the light was because multiple colors followed. a series of lights appeared one by one and then together. each time they grew brighter and more colorful. i even remember thinking that i had never seen some of the colors that were appearing and i could not look away. my eyes were stuck on it. then, a large ball of white\off-white light appeared and stayed for a minute or so and vanished. i am not sure, but they seemed rather close, maybe 30 feet or so above the car. i did'nt see a craft bit i felt like something was there. the air became really heavy and i had the feeling that something was there other than bright lights. afterwards, my ears were buzzing and i realized that my car was stopped on the side of the interstate. oddly, it was still in drive but not moving. i felt a strange mixture of fear, peace, and amazement. i sat for a while to collect my thoughts and called my fiancee to tell her what had happened. she did'nt believe me and this upset me because what i was feeling was so strong and tangible. i pressed the gas pedal and my car began moving with no trouble and went home. it was extremely difficult to sleep that night. i was so excited about my sighting and the fact that it was such an intense one at that.
Summary: A series of bright colored lights flashing very close to the ground, stopping my moving car.
